entities.name: portkey
entities.description: The Portkey is mentioned as an object that needs to be touched by Harry and Hermione. It's described as 'the old boot' held out by Amos Diggory.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people waiting for something. He's referred to as 'the best man' and his flying skills are compared to Ron's.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned alongside Harry as someone who needs to touch the Portkey.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is implied to be the one who fell off his broomstick, contrasting with Harry's flying skills.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as someone who knows what they're waiting for and is checking his watch.

entities.name: amos diggory
entities.description: Amos Diggory is holding the Portkey (the old boot) and helping to facilitate the process.

entities.name: lovegoods
entities.description: The Lovegoods are mentioned as being present for a week already.

entities.name: fawcetts
entities.description: The Fawcetts are mentioned as not being able to get tickets.

relationships.description: Harry needs to touch the Portkey, which is described as 'just a finger will do'.
Hermione also needs to touch the Portkey.
